name: Plz Dont Kill Me
description:
It is a simple setup. Since we at Midnight Software LLC are presently working on our MMORPG, Lands of Kolo, we need means to test out our server codes for things. So here comes this game.

It is a Online, MMO set up without the MMO.

It can support upto 90 users at a time, and you can create your own matches and join other matches. Its you against the other player(s)

Please report any problems so we can work on the server code as much as possible.
